title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 42.1 - Standards for brake fluid
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 42.1 - Standards for brake fluid

State Regulations

All hydraulic brake fluid sold within the State of New York
for use in hydraulic brake systems of motor vehicles shall conform in all
respects to Federal motor vehicle safety standard 116, 49 CFR
571.116. This standard may be purchased from
the Superintendent of Documents, U.S. Government Printing Office, Washington, DC 20402. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
42.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
